collection_holder_name: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts, Dorothy and Lewis B. Cullman Center
pageContext.collection_title: La forza del destino : radio broadcast, 1943-01-23 [sound recording] : opera in three acts / music by Giuseppe Verdi ; libretto by F.M. Piave.
pageContext.collection_description: Louis D'Angelo (Marquis of Calatrava) ; Stella Roman (Leonora) ; Lawrence Tibbett (Don Carlo) ; Frederick Jagel (Don Alvaro) ; Ezio Pinza (Padre Guardiano) ; Salvatore Baccaloni (Fra Melitone) ; Irra Petina (Preziosilla) ; Thelma Votipka (Curra) ; John Gurney (Surgeon) ; Lorenzo Alvary (Mayor) ; Alessio De Paolis (Trabuco) ; Metropolitan Opera Orchestra and Chorus ; Bruno Walter, conductor ; Milton Cross, broadcast announcer.
